summary: Adds buskers around Skyrim who perform outside in major cities. Currently in beta. Constantly being updated and expanded.
descriptionHtml:
Whilst roaming the cities of Skyrim I have often wondered why there is the abscence of buskers dotted around. So I have begun construction of a complete busking mod.

Plans for the mod:

- Add more unique buskers to the world of Skyrim
- Add quest lines for some of the Buskers
- Create \'audiences\' for the buskers that will come and go and will give money to the busker
- Allow the player to give money to the busker
- Create unique sound files for the buskers (any voice actors who are interested can PM me)
- Mod the music levels to make the sound of the buskers more prominent
- Give the buskers tours of Skyrim, moving from city to city
- Create individual homes for the buskers to migrate to every night


Beta 1.2: Money is now withdrawn from you after agreeing to give Buskers money. Voice acting for Busker Tony Fletcher is now included.

Beta 1.1:
Interaction with Tony Fletcher has increased and you can offer him praise. The layout is there to give him money but it will not actually give it him yet. I am working on this now. 

Beta 1.0:
Busker is located located in Solitude near the ramp that leads up to the forge (take a left out of the winking skeever). His name is Tony Fletcher. He will play randomly. Interaction with him is limited.


If anybody has any requests or ideas for the mod, please just say and I shall try to integrate them.
Thank you for downloading and please endorse the mod.
This mod should be compatible with all mods.
author: 96downlu
